OOC: Another war post, goody. And I am NOT THE CODE!!!

BIC:
> Dark One barrell rolled, dodging a most of the lasers, a few hitting his
> wing, almost losing control of his current mode, but with extreme skill,
Dark
> One was flying almost as good as before.
>
> Getting a target lock, he launched two missiles at the Mafia base.

Base damage again: Base revieves minor damage, like a realistic base.

> "Of course not!" Breakdown retorted, firing a blast of pure laser from his
> cannon, heading at Belnder's disk.

Blender's disk cracks in half, one half clnking to the ground, the other
half still heading straight at Breakdown.

> Pyro simply laughed as Stronghold punched at him, driving forward at full
> speed, trying to ram him down.  At the same time, he fired two fire balls
> forward at the Mafia base.

PYro had missed as Stronghold was shot out of the way just in time. (See
earlier post) This came before Stronghold decided to leave.

> Hiss ducked under the missile, the explosion almost toppling him over.  He
> returned fire with three fusion blasts at Stronghold.  "WHY WON'T YOU
DIE?!"

Stronghold seen the blasts coming this time and fired against them, making
only a few burn wounds worth of damage. Stronghold started leaving again,
growling at the insolence of the Alliance.

> Scavenger fired off 25 explosive rounds at Rizopas.

Rizopas seen the rounds, knowing they had to be explosive, he rolled to the
side, each one explosion misssing him by a few feet. He flips to his feet.
Rizopas got out his own charges, throwing 2 at Scavenger before running.

> "I agree brother.  They do not know when to surrender or when to DIE."
Flesh
> Ripper yelled out, firing three blasts from his rifle at Blender.

Stronghold knocks Blender out of the way, the rifle blasts going past where
Blender was and hitting a tree. Stronghold grabbed Blender and angrily
stomped away again.
